title: Today's Art Market, Next-Gen Collectors, and NFTs
description: "All of wealth management and banking is trying to wrap their head around" the ecosystem of non-fungible tokens and digital art, says Evan Beard, who runs the art services group at Bank of America Private Bank.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: "All of wealth management and banking is trying to wrap their head around" the ecosystem of non-fungible tokens and digital art, says Evan Beard, who runs the art services group at Bank of America Private Bank.
